description: Gets information about chat controls configured for an existing Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application for which the chat controls are configured.

nested_items.name: responseScope
nested_items.description: The response scope configured for a Amazon Q Business application. This determines whether your application uses its retrieval augmented generation (RAG) system to generate answers only from your enterprise data, or also uses the large language models (LLM) knowledge to respons to end user questions in chat.

nested_items.name: orchestrationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The chat response orchestration settings for your application.

nested_items.name: control
nested_items.description: Information about whether chat orchestration is enabled or disabled for an Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: blockedPhrases
nested_items.description: The phrases blocked from chat by your chat control configuration.

nested_items.name: blockedPhrases
nested_items.description: A list of phrases blocked from a Amazon Q Business web experience chat.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: systemMessageOverride
nested_items.description: The configured custom message displayed to an end user informing them that they've used a blocked phrase during chat.

nested_items.name: topicConfigurations
nested_items.description: The topic specific controls configured for a Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name for your topic control configuration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for your topic control configuration. Use this to outline how the large language model (LLM) should use this topic control configuration.

nested_items.name: exampleChatMessages
nested_items.description: A list of example phrases that you expect the end user to use in relation to the topic.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: Rules defined for a topic configuration.

nested_items.name: includedUsersAndGroups
nested_items.description: Users and groups to be included in a rule.

nested_items.name: userIds
nested_items.description: The user ids associated with a topic control rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: userGroups
nested_items.description: The user group names associated with a topic control rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: excludedUsersAndGroups
nested_items.description: Users and groups to be excluded from a rule.

nested_items.name: userIds
nested_items.description: The user ids associated with a topic control rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: userGroups
nested_items.description: The user group names associated with a topic control rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ruleType
nested_items.description: The type of rule.

nested_items.name: ruleConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information for a rule.

nested_items.name: contentBlockerRule
nested_items.description: A rule for configuring how Amazon Q Business responds when it encounters a a blocked topic.

nested_items.name: systemMessageOverride
nested_items.description: The configured custom message displayed to an end user informing them that they've used a blocked phrase during chat.

nested_items.name: contentRetrievalRule
nested_items.description: Rules for retrieving content from data sources connected to a Amazon Q Business application for a specific topic control configuration.

nested_items.name: eligibleDataSources
nested_items.description: Specifies data sources in a Amazon Q Business application to use for content generation.

nested_items.name: indexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the index the data source is attached to.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source.

nested_items.name: creatorModeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration details for CREATOR_MODE.

nested_items.name: creatorModeControl
nested_items.description: Information about whether creator mode is enabled or disabled for an Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the maxResults response was incomplete because there is more data to retrieve, Amazon Q Business returns a pagination token in the response. You can use this pagination token to retrieve the next set of Amazon Q Business chat controls configured.

nested_items.name: hallucinationReductionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The hallucination reduction settings for your application.

nested_items.name: hallucinationReductionControl
nested_items.description: Controls whether hallucination reduction has been enabled or disabled for your application. The default status is DISABLED.
